resources.string: :( CURRENTLY YOU DO NOT HAVE ANY ACTIVE BIDS.
"HANG ON A SECOND, WE ARE LISTING OUR AWESOME PRODUCTS FOR YOU!"
"HANG ON A SECOND... WE ARE UPDATING YOUR PRODUCT LIST."
"WANT TO BARGAIN ON THE PRODUCT? ENTER THE PRICE"
"THAT'S NICE... YOU WANT TO GIVE USER AN OFFER?"
"Final price at which you are willing to sell"
" You cannot enter a price less than 40% more than 100% of the MRP of product. "
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions." yes

string-array.name: UserTips
string-array.item: "Tip!- We also give unexpected discounts to first buyer of a product if you add the product to cart directly! So, Hurry Up!"
"Tip!- Instead of directly adding product to cart, try to save some bucks by bargain"
"Tip!- Our stats say users having personal chat with the seller save 10% more."
"Tip!- For any further information related to product you can chat with the seller. Tap on product for chat option!"
"Tip!- Our sellers also give attractive offers if you request bargain at around 10% less price."
"Tip!- Well behaved conversation with seller will increase the chances of accept of bargain request! "
"Tip!- You can also contact seller personally for customization of any product or additional benefits"
"Tip!- You can only request bargain on a product 2 times!"
"Tip!- You can also buy for higher price than mentioned in case product is low on stock!"
